blocks.name: inelr
blocks.content: The imaginary unit ` _i ` is not a real number. (Contributed by NM, 6-May-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm inelr() {
  |- wn(wcel(ci, cr))
} = {
  mto(wcel(ci, cr), wceq(ci, nat0))
  neii(ci, nat0)
  ine0()
  mpi(wcel(ci, cr), wceq(ci, nat0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, co(ci, cmul, ci))))
  mtbir(wbr(nat0, clt, co(ci, cmul, ci)), wbr(nat1, clt, nat0))
  ax-mp(wn(wbr(nat1, clt, nat0)), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  ltnsymi(nat0, nat1)
  bitri(wbr(nat0, clt, co(ci, cmul, ci)), wbr(nat1, clt, nat0), wbr(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1)))
  ltadd1i(nat0, co(ci, cmul, ci), nat1)
  0re()
  eqeltri(co(ci, cmul, ci), cr, cneg(nat1))
  ixi()
  renegcli(nat1)
  1re()
  breq12i(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), clt, co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), nat1, nat0)
  addid2i(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  ax-i2m1()
  necon1bd(ci, nat0, wcel(ci, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(ci, cmul, ci)))
  ex(wcel(ci, cr), wne(ci, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(ci, cmul, ci)))
  msqgt0(ci)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inelr() {
  ⊢ ¬ i ∈ ℝ
} = {
  mto(i ∈ ℝ, i = 0)
  neii(ci, nat0)
  ine0()
  mpi(i ∈ ℝ, i = 0, ¬ 0[<](i[×]i))
  mtbir(0[<](i[×]i), 1[<]0)
  ax-mp(¬ 1[<]0, 0[<]1)
  0lt1()
  ltnsymi(nat0, nat1)
  bitri(0[<](i[×]i), 1[<]0, (0[+]1)[<]((i[×]i)[+]1))
  ltadd1i(nat0, (i[×]i), nat1)
  0re()
  eqeltri((i[×]i), cr, -u(1))
  ixi()
  renegcli(nat1)
  1re()
  breq12i((0[+]1), clt, ((i[×]i)[+]1), nat1, nat0)
  addid2i(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  ax-i2m1()
  necon1bd(ci, nat0, i ∈ ℝ, 0[<](i[×]i))
  ex(i ∈ ℝ, i ≠ 0, 0[<](i[×]i))
  msqgt0(ci)
}

blocks.name: rimul
blocks.content: A real number times the imaginary unit is real only if the number is 0. (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rimul(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wceq(c0, nat0))
} = {
  mpi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wceq(c0, nat0), wn(wcel(ci, cr)))
  inelr()
  necon1bd(c0, nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wcel(ci, cr))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(ci, cr))
  eqeltrrd(ci, cr, co(co(ci, cmul, c0), cdiv, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wne(c0, nat0)))
  divcan4d(ci, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wne(c0, nat0)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  recnd(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wne(c0, nat0)))
  redivcld(co(ci, cmul, c0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wne(c0, nat0)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cr)), wne(c0, nat0))
}

blocks.name: crne0
blocks.content: The real representation of complex numbers is nonzero iff one of its terms is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm crne0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wo(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)), wne(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0)))
} = {
  syl6rbbr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wo(wne(c0, nat0), wne(c1, nat0)), wne(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0), wn(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))))
  necon3abid(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  syl5bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), nat0), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, nat0))))
  eqeq2i(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, nat0)), nat0)
  eqtri(co(nat0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, nat0)), nat0, co(nat0, caddc, nat0))
  oveq2i(nat0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, nat0), nat0)
  mul01i(ci)
  ax-icn()
  00id()
  mpanr12(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, nat0))), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  cru(c0, c1, nat0, nat0)
  neorian(c0, nat0, c1, nat0)
}
